extendedInfo.description: If you are Backstreet Boys's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Backstreet Boys's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Backstreet Boys's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Backstreet Boys's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)--------------------------------Main Features --------------------------------- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics--------------------------------List of albums --------------------------------- Backstreet Boys- Backstreet's Back- Millennium- Black & Blue- Never Gone- Unbreakable- This Is Us--------------------------------List of lyrics --------------------------------- 10,000 Promises- All I Have To Give- All Of Your Life (You Need Love)- Any Other Way- Anywhere For You- As Long As You Love Me- Back To Your Heart- Beautiful Woman- Bigger- Boys Will Be Boys- Bye Bye Love- Climbing The Walls- Crawling Back To You- Darlin'- Don't Wanna Lose You Now- Don't Want You Back- Downpour- Evergreen- Everybody (Backstreet's Back)- Everyone- Everything But Mine- Everytime I Close My Eyes- Get Another Boyfriend- Get Down (You're The One For Me)- Happily Never After- Helpless- Helpless When She Smiles- Hey, Mr. DJ (Keep Playin' That Song)- How Did I Fall In Love With You?- I Need You Tonight- I Promise You (With Everything I Am)- I Still...- I Wanna Be With You- I Want It That Way- If I Don't Have You- If I Knew Then- If You Want It To Be Good Girl (Get Yourself A Bad Boy)- I'll Never Break Your Heart- In Pieces- Incomplete- Inconsolable- International Luv- Intro- It's Gotta Be You- It's True- Just To Be Close To You- Just Want You To Know- Larger Than Life- Last Night You Saved My Life- Let's Have A Party- Like A Child- Lose It All- Love Will Keep You Up All Night- Masquerade- More Than That- Movin' On- Never Gone- No One Else Comes Close- Nobody But You- Not For Me- Nowhere To Go- One In A Million- Panic- PDA (Public Display Of Affection)- Poster Girl- Quit Playin' Games (With My Heart)- Roll With It- Rush Over Me- Safest Place To Hide- Satellite- Set Adrift On Memory Bliss- Shape Of My Heart- Shattered- She's A Dream- Shining Star- Show Me The Meaning Of Being Lonely- Siberia- Sick As My Secrets- Something That I Already Know- Song For The Unloved- Spanish Eyes- Straight Through My Heart- That's The Way I Like It- That's What She Said- The Answer To Our Life- The Call- The One- The Perfect Fan- There's Us- This Is Us- Time- Treat Me Right- Trouble Is- Undone- Unmistakable- Unsuspecting Sunday Afternoon- Weird World- We've Got It Goin On- What Makes You Different (Makes You Beautiful)- Yes, I Will- You Can Let Go

reviews.title: So-so
reviews.comment: I would give it five if it include \'In A World Like This\'.
reviews.author: samuel len

reviews.comment: Umm where\'s In A World Like This??
reviews.author: Carolina Rios
